kou opened a new pull request #10773:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10773


   If bundled gRPC uses system shared OpenSSL, libarrow_flight.so should
   link system shared OpenSSL.
   
   See also: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10768#issuecomment-884726000


--

fields.description:
This causes Apache Arrow GLib verification failure:
https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10768
